name: Machinery
purposeOfAppointment: Categories of machine specified in Schedule 2, Part 4 of the regulation

name: Equipment and protective systems for use in potentially explosive atmospheres
regulation: The equipment and protective systems for use in potentially explosive atmospheres regulations 2016
purposeOfAppointment: Conformity assessment of electrical and non-electrical: - Equipment and protective systems - Safety devices, controlling devices and regulating devices

name: Pressure Equipment
purposeOfAppointment: Conformity assessment of Pressure Equipment falling within Regulation 6 and classified in accordance with Schedule 3 as either Category I, II, III, or IV equipment.

name: Pressure Equipment
purposeOfAppointment: Issuing of approval relating to the conformity of materials with the requirements of the regulations.

name: Pressure Equipment
purposeOfAppointment: Approval of procedures or personnel for the permanent joining of materials in equipment of the following categories;

name: Pressure Equipment
purposeOfAppointment: Appointment as a Recognised Third Party Organisation for Pressure Equipment

name: Pressure Equipment
purposeOfAppointment: Appointment as a User Inspectorate for Pressure Equipment in the following categories

name: Pressure Vessels
purposeOfAppointment: Conformity assessment procedures prior to manufacture (Regulation 40)

name: Pressure Vessels
purposeOfAppointment: Conformity assessment procedures prior to placing a vessel on the market (Regulation 41)

name: Gas appliances and related
regulation: Regulation 2016/426 on appliances burning gaseous fuels

name: Noise Emission
regulation: The Noise Emission in the Environment by Equipment for use Outdoors Regulations 2001

name: Recreational Craft
purposeOfAppointment: Conformity assessment of recreational craft, personal watercraft, components, engines as defined in Regulation 3.

name: Cableway Installation
regulation: Cableway Installations (Regulation (EU) 2016/424 as brought into UK law and amended)
purposeOfAppointment: The conformity assessment of Safety Components intended to be incorporated into a sub-system or cableway installation for the purpose of ensuring a safety function, the failure of which endangers the safety or health of passengers, operating personnel or third parties.

name: Cableway Installation
regulation: Cableway Installations (Regulation (EU) 2016/424 as brought into UK law and amended)
purposeOfAppointment: The conformity assessment of subsystems intended for incorporation into cableway installation

name: Explosives
purposeOfAppointment: Civil explosives, defined as materials and articles considered to be explosives in the UN Recommendations on the transport of dangerous goods and falling within class 1 of those recommendations, but excluding ammunition (the acquisition of which is regulated or prohibited by virtue of the Firearms Acts 1968 to 1997), explosives intended for the lawful use by the armed forces or police of any country and pyrotechnic articles
